response.overview: A tramp cares for a boy after he's abandoned as a newborn by his mother. Later the mother has a change of heart and aches to be reunited with her son.
response.title: The Kid

cast.name: Rupert Franklin
cast.character: Bride's Father / Extra in Reception Scene (uncredited)

release_dates.note: Beijing International Film Festival (4K Restored Version)
Barcelona & Madrid (100th Anniversary, 4K Restored, Subtitled Version, Re-release Premiere)
Film by the Sea Film Festival
